special_text:
I – Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among those cards onto the battlefield tapped, put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
II – Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
III – Bless. [i](Create a colorless Blessing aura enchantment token attached to a nonland permanent with “Enchant nonland permanent” and “As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
